title: Niger Inflation Rate MoM
description: The Consumer Price Index in Niger decreased 1 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in Niger averaged 0.16 percent from 2010 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 4 percent in June of 2017 and a record low of -2 percent in February of 2014. This page provides - Niger Inflation Rate MoM- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Institut National de la Statistique du Niger
